►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week a court case revealed Facebook and Zuck used Onavo VPN to spy on users and decrypt encrypted traffic from Snapchat, YouTube and Amazon, the Pixel 9 line got a new model , and a new technology for blue OLEDs could avoid burn-in.

Episode 191
 
This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-investigation-finds-zuck-shipped-malware-for-5-years
